definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: 這項發明革命性地推動了眼科學的發展。

sentences.english: He also serves as a spokesman for the American Academy of Ophthalmology.
sentences.chinese: 他同時還擔任美國眼科學會的發言人。

sentences.english: Detailed ophthalmologic evaluation was performed in all the subjects.
sentences.chinese: 對所有研究對象進行了詳細的眼科學評價。

sentences.english: She has complete basic knowledge and clinical experience in ophthalmology.
sentences.chinese: 具備全面的眼科學基礎理論及臨牀經驗。
